```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```


 


```{r}

roman_empire1 <- read.csv("re_data/hanson_cities_reform.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

re1 <- roman_empire1 %>% 
  select( -c(x : x_3,x_4 : x_21 ))

re1
```
```{r}
roman_empire2 <- read_csv("re_data/Hanson2016_Civic Status_OxREP.csv") %>% clean_names()



roman_empire2
```


```{r}
roman_empire <- full_join(re1,roman_empire2, by = "primary_key")

roman_empire
```

```{r}
write_csv(roman_empire,"re_data/roman_empire_modification.csv")

```









```{r}
count_cities <- roman_empire %>% 
  group_by(Province, Modern.Toponym) %>% 
  summarise(counts = n())
  
  
  
  ggplot(count_cities)+
    geom_bar(aes(x = Province, y = counts, fill = Modern.Toponym ), stat = 'identity')
  
  
  
  
  
  ggplot()+
  geom_bar()
```
